member.name: T:DBConfirm.Packages.SQLServer.MSTest.MSTestBase
member.summary: The abstract base class for test classes using MSTest and SQL Server

member.name: P:DBConfirm.Packages.SQLServer.MSTest.MSTestBase.TestRunnerFactory
member.summary: Uses to generate as the test runner

member.name: P:DBConfirm.Packages.SQLServer.MSTest.MSTestBase.ExecutionPlanRunner
member.summary: Provides the ability to execute commands and record the execution plans for analysis

member.name: M:DBConfirm.Packages.SQLServer.MSTest.MSTestBase.BaseInit
member.summary: The initialisation method to set up the for the test, and making the initial connection to the target database. Also sets up the ExecutionPlanRunner, to use the same instance.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation
